CustomField.description: This field indicates if method entry and exit telemetry logging is included in the logs. The Org Default should be false. To grant this ability, add a custom setting per user or profile.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates if method entry and exit telemetry logging is included in the logs. The Org Default should be false. To grant this ability, add a custom setting per user or profile.
CustomField.label: Enable Method Telemetry Logging
